data.title: Katie Holmes shows off incredibly fit physique as ex Jamie Foxx returns from health scare
data.meta_description: The American actress was reportedly worried about her ex Jamie Foxx when he was rushed to the hospital with an undisclosed medical emergency earlier this year.
data.text:
Jamie Foxx shares update

Katie Holmes showed off toned abs and a fit physique in the latest shots of The Boy star.

She donned baggy green sweatpants, sneakers and a small black top as she took a walk around New York.

Her casual yet stylish look was completed with a collection of chain necklaces, see-through shades and earrings.

The Batman Begins star recently expressed concern for her ex Jamie Foxx during his recent health scare.

“She and Jamie didn’t end on the best of terms. But regardless, she is very concerned,” a source told Radar Online.

READ MORE Jamie Foxx announces his return to work months after worrying ICU dash

“Katie is desperate to find out more details but a lot of her calls to their mutual friends are going answered. No one knows what is going on.”

Holmes dated Foxx between 2013 and 2019 shortly after her divorce from Tom Cruise.

The reasons for their breakup are still a mystery to the public, although there were several factors that could have been involved.

Sources claimed industry pressures or distance could have provoked the split, but the full story has yet to be told.

Don't miss...

Discontinued Allans now worth top dollar thanks to Barbie success [INSIGHT]

Meghan Markle's ex-pal says 'writing on the wall' for couple after Harry rumors [COMMENT]

Barbie plot holes that don't make sense - from missing star to brainwashing [BLUNDERS]

Holmes wasn’t the only star who struggled to get answers when they reached out during the actor’s health scare.

His They Cloned Tyrone star John Boyega was also worried when he attended the new Netflix film’s premiere without Foxx.

“He finally picked up the phone. Thank you, bro,” he later told People.

“He’s doing well. And then, you know, we’re just giving him the privacy, and we can’t wait for his return.”

Thankfully, Foxx seems well on his way to a full recovery, and even threw a party at his Chicago physical rehab centre to celebrate feeling better.

He and his daughter Corinne recently took to Instagram to promote a new collaboration with BetMGM, his first gig since his stint in hospital.

In his latest Instagram post, he took the time to thank his fans for sending their support during his recovery.

“I went to hell and back,” he told his 16.7 million followers.

“And my road to recovery has some potholes as well, but I’m coming back. I’m able to work.”
